turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can I do a pick up order for Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get an venti ice cafe mocha with 2% milk, whipped cream, and two splendors, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and you said you wanted a venti iced caffe mocha with 2%, whipped cream, and 2 splendas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, which starbucks would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick it up from 225 North Michigan, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a venti iced caffe mocha with 2%, whipped cream, and 2 splendas to be picked up at the starbucks at 225 north michigan, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
